reviewText: Great performance by all actors.  Joseph Cotton's character somehow detected Marilyn's lover and knocked he out.  I am not sure how he was able to detect who he was?  I had visited Niagara Falls (with parents) about the same time that this picture was filmed and remember all of the scenes, wearing the rain coats, being on the wooden walkways next to the falls, and being aboard the Maid of The Mist.  This film is a real Classic of All Time.
Enjoyed seeing the falls as the area was in the fifties, there were some areas left such as the wooden stairs on the U.S., Also enjoyed the actors and the theme.
This is one of my favorite movies, and it was delivered to me promptly and in perfect condition. The service was excellent and I couldn't be happier.
A classic.  Played well as a DVD.

The dvd only worked for a few minutes and froze solid.  Tried it in 2 separate players and it was defective, I returned it on December 29th, 2016.  It is a classic movie and I will re-order at some point in the future.
Love this movie. Very happy with quality
The DVD print was very disappointing.  I look forward to getting a Bluray copy sometime soon.  That hopefully will be as good as the cable broadcast.
Enjoyed it a lot.

This is my absolute favorite Marily Monroe picture of all time. Her acting was superb in this film, and as was Joseph Cotten as her tortured husband. I have watched this movie many times on TCM and decided to purchase a DVD for myself. I was able to find a used copy in wonderful condition, and the seller shipped it to me promptly, at a great price!
DVD arrived promptly in excellent (new) condition. Marilyn has never looked better. The story and the scenes of the Falls will make you feel as if you visited them.

Had been waiting for a cheaper version of this DVD to come out. The price was right as other versions were more expensive. The quality of the playback was perfect. Great film, I have seen a number of times on TCM, but wanted my own copy. Marilyn Monroe is physically stunning which adds to Joseph Cotten's fine portrayal as the neurotically obsessed husband of Monroe. And the scenery of Niagra Falls adds to making this a great film
I am very happy with this product
Didn't get it, i.looked everywhere, no movie.
Used for Cinema Therapy class.  I wanted to show a Marilyn Monroe movie.  We discussed PTSD, evil people,. naive people. etc. ,
The disk was in good shape and played fine. The case was a little beat up but that's to be expected from a used DVD.
I love it. It's great.
Wonderful movie to watch and own!!! Great in color!!!
Love this movie!  Very happy with it.  Lindy Miller
loved it
Love old movies. This was a good one.
One of my all time favorite movies!  Thanks, MC
Very underrated Monroe film, better than some of the more praised movies she did.
Just love Marilyn.  And the falls.
